posts.post_content:
Three PSA cards that I'm trying to convert to SGC.  I also have a GAI 1.5 George Hunter (Piedmont, first graded).  Willing to trade these four cards for any TWO T206 SGC 10/20 cards.  Or $55 for the lot of four.  Let me know if you are interested in a scan of the Hunter.

The other cards are: Jack Barry (Sweet Caporal pencil mark 'B' on back), Josh Clark (Piedmont), Dolly Gray (Piedmont)

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/psa1/web.jpg?ver=12791545530001[/IMG]
